axis_supply.supply_status: Strained. By Q3 1942, Axis supply lines under severe pressure from Malta-based RAF and Royal Navy interdiction. Fuel critically short (60% of requirement), ammunition adequate but declining, food reduced rations. Rommel's August offensive (Alam Halfa) planned around fuel constraints.

allied_supply.supply_status: Adequate for defensive operations, building up reserves for offensive. Newly arrived from UK, still acclimatizing to desert conditions. Supply lines from Alexandria (240km) secure but division building forward dumps.
